breakfast.Name: Pancakes
breakfast.Description: Fluffy American-style pancakes served with syrup.
breakfast.Author: Good Food Team
Method: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk eggs, butter, and milk separately, then combine.
Fry ladlefuls in a non-stick pan until golden.

breakfast.Name: Avocado Toast
breakfast.Description: A quick and healthy breakfast made with ripe avocados and sourdough.
breakfast.Author: Sarah Cook
Method: Toast the bread.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread on toast and top with chili flakes if using.

breakfast.Name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
breakfast.Description: A vibrant bowl of blended berries, banana, and toppings.
breakfast.Author: Anna Glover
Ingredients: Toppings: granola, chia seeds, sliced fruit
Method: Blend banana, berries, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and add toppings of your choice.

breakfast.Name: Egg Muffins
breakfast.Description: Protein-packed egg muffins perfect for on-the-go breakfasts.
breakfast.Author: Tom Kerridge
Method: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Whisk eggs and stir in chopped spinach, feta, and tomatoes.
Pour into muffin tins and bake for 15-20 minutes.

lunch.Name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
lunch.Description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken for a hearty lunch.
lunch.Author: Jane Doe
Method: Grill the seasoned chicken breasts until cooked.
Chop lettuce and toss with dressing and croutons.
Top with sliced chicken and Parmesan.

lunch.Name: Tuna Wrap
lunch.Description: Quick tuna wrap with crisp veggies and mayo.
lunch.Author: Emily Smith
Method: Mix tuna and mayo.
Layer on wrap with lettuce and carrot.
Wrap tightly and serve.

lunch.Name: Tomato Basil Soup
lunch.Description: Rich and creamy tomato soup with a touch of basil.
lunch.Author: Olivia Green
Method: Sauté onion and garlic in oil.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend until smooth and stir in chopped basil.

lunch.Name: Quinoa Salad
lunch.Description: Healthy and filling salad with quinoa, cucumber, and feta.
lunch.Author: James Martin
Method: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.
Serve chilled.

dinner.Name: Spaghetti Bolognese
dinner.Description: A hearty Italian classic perfect for dinner.
dinner.Author: Chef Luigi
Method: Cook spaghetti as per instructions.
Fry onion and garlic, add beef and brown.
Stir in tomatoes and purée, simmer 20 mins.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

dinner.Name: Vegetable Stir Fry
dinner.Description: A colorful, quick stir-fry packed with veggies.
dinner.Author: Ella Woods
Method: Heat oil and fry garlic.
Add sliced vegetables and stir-fry for 5-6 minutes.
Add soy sauce and serve hot.

dinner.Name: Chicken Tikka Masala
dinner.Description: Creamy and spiced chicken curry, a British-Indian favorite.
dinner.Author: Ravi Kapoor
Method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste.
Cook onions, then add chicken and cook through.
Stir in cream, garnish with coriander.

dinner.Name: Baked Salmon with Veggies
dinner.Description: Healthy baked salmon with roasted seasonal vegetables.
dinner.Author: Liam Stone
Method: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Place salmon and chopped veggies on a tray.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Bake 20 mins.
